attributes.additional_details: Hanging was the worst thing that any government ever dreamed of doing over 50 or more years ago when it was enfore we never had so much crime and we do now Capital punshment should be reinstated for all major crime including rape, murger, terrorimsm. all they get now is life imprisoment and a slap on the wrist where the justice in that this country now goes for the soft option and sides with the criminals and not the victims our justice system needs a radical shake up
